mapper.select: select * from users order by id desc limit #{page}, #{pageSize}
select COUNT(id) as total from users
mapper.insert: insert into users(user_code, username, password, real_name, avatar, gender, user_type, email, mobile, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{userCode}, #{username}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{avatar}, #{gender}, #{userType}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update users set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, real_name = #{realName}, avatar = #{avatar}, gender = #{gender}, user_type = #{userType}, email = #{email}, mobile = #{mobile}, status = #{status}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
